sides.ability: During the System Phase, if any of this card's [Charge] are inactive, you must spend 1 [Charge] to drop 1 concussion bomb using the [1 [Straight]] template, if able. Otherwise, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop 1 concussion bomb.

device.name: Concussion Bomb
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates.  When this device detonates, each ship and remote at range 0–1 is dealt 1 facedown damage card. Then, each ship at range 0–1 must expose 1 damage card unless it chooses to gain 1 strain token.

sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend up to 2 [Charge] to drop that many Thermal Detonators using the [1 [Straight]] or [2 [Straight]] template. Each must be placed using a different template. When you reload this card, recover 1 additional [Charge].
sides.title: Thermal Detonators

device.name: Thermal Detonators
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, each ship and remote at range 0–1 rolls 1 attack die. Each ship gains 1 strain token for each [Focus] result, and each ship and remote suffers 1 [Hit]/[Crit] damage for each matching result.

sides.title: Heightened Perception

sides.title: Supernatural Reflexes
sides.ability: Before you activate, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Brilliant Evasion
sides.ability: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force] to change 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] results.

sides.ability: After you suffer 1 or more damage, recover that many [Force].

sides.title: Predictive Shot
sides.ability: After you declare an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Force]. If you do, during the Roll Defense Dice step, the defender cannot roll more defense dice than the number of your [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results.

sides.ability: After you reveal your dial, you may spend 1 [Force] to perform a [Barrel Roll] or [Boost] action. Then, if you performed an action you do not have on your action bar, gain 1 strain token. If you do, you cannot perform another action during your activation.
While you perform a [Boost] action, you may spend 1 [Force] to use the turn ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) template instead.

sides.title: Engine Upgrade
sides.text: Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings, add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.

sides.title: Hull Upgrade
sides.text: For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.

sides.title: Munitions Failsafe
sides.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 [Charge] you spent as a cost for the attack.

sides.title: Shield Upgrade
sides.text: Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship's shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.

sides.title: Static Discharge Vanes
sides.ability: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead, then you suffer 1 [Hit] damage.

sides.title: Synchronized Console

sides.title: Spare Parts Canisters

sides.text: Starfighter shields often have manual overrides that allow them to be angled for increased front or rear protection. However, doing so leaves the ship exposed if the pilot's situational awareness falters.
sides.title: Angled Deflectors

sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may choose up to 3 friendly ships at range 0-3. If you do, each of these ships does not remove 1 calculate token.

sides.title: TV-94
sides.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 performs a primary attack against a defender in its [Bullseye Arc], if there are 2 or fewer attack dice, it may spend 1 calculate token to add 1 [Hit] result.

sides.title: K2-B4
sides.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-3 defends, it may spend 1 calculate token. If it does, add 1 [Evade] result unless the attacker chooses to gain 1 strain token.

sides.title: TA-175
sides.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 with [Calculate] on its action bar is destroyed, each friendly ship at range 0-3 with [Calculate] in its action bar gains 1 calculate token.

sides.title: Kalani
sides.ability: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, if it is in the [Bullseye Arc] of a friendly ship at range 0-3, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, that friendly ship acquires a lock on that enemy ship, then gains 1 stress token.

sides.title: Composure
sides.ability: After you fail an action, if you have no green tokens, you may perform a [Focus] action. If you do, you cannot perform additional actions this round.

sides.title: Crack Shot
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], before the Neutralize Results step, you may spend 1 [Charge] to cancel 1 [Evade] result.

sides.title: Daredevil
sides.ability: While you perform a white [Boost] action, you may treat it as red to use the [1 [Turn Left]] or [1 [Turn Right]] template instead.

sides.title: Debris Gambit
sides.ability: While you perform a red [Evade] action, if there is an obstacle at range 0-1, treat the action as white instead.

sides.title: Elusive
sides.ability: While you defend, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 defense die. After you fully execute a red maneuver, recover 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Expert Handling
sides.text: While heavy fighters can often be coaxed into a barrel roll, seasoned pilots know how to do it without putting undue stress on their craft or leaving themselves open to attack.

sides.title: Fanatical
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are not shielded, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Fearless
sides.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] primary attack, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the defender's [Front Arc], you may change 1 of your results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Heroic
sides.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if you have only blank results and have 2 or more results, you may reroll any number of your dice.

sides.title: Intimidation
sides.ability: While an enemy ship at range 0 defends, it rolls 1 fewer defense die.

sides.title: Juke
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are evading, you may change 1 of the defender's [Evade] results to a [Focus] result.

sides.title: Lone Wolf
sides.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if there are no other friendly ships at range 0-2, you may spend 1 [Charge] to reroll 1 of your dice.

sides.title: Marksmanship
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Outmaneuver
sides.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] attack, if you are not in the defender's firing arc, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

sides.title: Predator
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may reroll 1 attack die.

sides.title: Ruthless
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at range 0-1 of the defender. If you do, that ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage and you may change 1 of your die results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Saturation Salvo
sides.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] from that upgrade. If you do, choose two defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

sides.title: Selfless
sides.ability: While another friendly ship at range 0-1 defends, before the Neutralize Results step, if you are in the attack arc, you may suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage to cancel 1 [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Squad Leader
sides.ability: While you coordinate, the ship you choose can perform an action only if that action is also on your action bar.

sides.title: Swarm Tactics
sides.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at range 1. If you do, that ship treats its initiative as equal to yours until the end of the round.

sides.title: Trick Shot
sides.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, roll 1 additional attack die.

sides.title: Treacherous
sides.ability: While you defend, you may choose a ship obstructing the attack and spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, cancel 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, and the ship you chose gains 1 strain token. After a ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, recover 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Dedicated
sides.ability: While another friendly ship in your [Left Arc] or [Right Arc] at range 0-2 defends, if it is limited or has the Dedicated upgrade and you are not strained, you may gain 1 strain token. If you do, the defender rerolls 1 of their blank results.

sides.title: Ensnare
sides.ability: At the end of the Activation Phase, if you are tractored, you may choose 1 ship in your [Single Turret Arc] arc at range 0-1. Transfer 1 tractor token to it.
After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against it as a bonus attack. Attack: Your dice cannot be modified.
sides.title: Snap Shot
Gravitic Deflection
sides.ability: While you defend, you may reroll 1 defense die for each tractored ship in the attack arc.

Setup: Equip this side faceup. While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may perform [Focus] actions even while stressed. After you perform an attack, if you are stressed, the defender may spend 1 focus token or suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage to flip this card.
sides.title: Proud Tradition

sides.ability: Treat your [Focus] actions as red.
sides.title: False Tradition
Deadeye Shot
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Bullseye Arc], you may spend 1 [Hit] result or change 1 [Critical Hit] result to a [Hit] result. If you do, the defender exposes 1 of its damage cards.

While you boost or barrel roll, if your equipped [Configuration] upgrade has the “(Closed)” side faceup, you can move through and overlap obstacles. After you boost or barrel roll through an obstacle, if you are not at range 0 of it, gain 1 evade token.
sides.title: Backwards Tailslide

sides.ability: After you fully execute a red maneuver, you may perform a [Barrel Roll] action, even while stressed. If you do, roll an attack die; on a [Hit] result gain 1 strain token, and on a [Critical Hit] result gain 1 ion token.
sides.title: Ion Limiter Override

sides.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through an obstacle, structure, or huge ship, or if you deployed, you may choose 1 enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1-2. That ship gains 1 strain token.
sides.title: Marg Sabl Closure

sides.ability: After you fully execute a maneuver, you may choose 1 enemy ship you moved through. That ship gains 1 strain token. Then, if you are in that ship's firing arc, you gain 1 strain token.
sides.title: Starbird Slash

sides.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited or has the Cutthroat upgrade, you may remove 1 of your orange or red tokens, or recover 1 non-recurring [Charge] on your ship card or one of your equipped upgrade cards.
sides.title: Cutthroat

sides.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited or has the Disciplined upgrade, you may perform a [Lock] or [Barrel Roll] action.
sides.title: Disciplined

sides.ability: After another friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited or has the Hopeful upgrade, you may perform a [Focus] or [Boost] action.
sides.title: Hopeful

sides.ability: Before you execute a speed 1-2 turn ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) or speed 1-2 Koiogran Turn ([Koiogran Turn]) maneuver, if you are at range 0-1 of an asteroid, structure, or huge ship, you may gain 1 tractor token.
sides.title: Interloper Turn

sides.ability: You can perform special attacks even while at range 0 of asteroids. While you defend, if you are at range 0 of an obstacle, attack dice cannot be rerolled.
sides.title: Tierfon Belly Run
Feedback Ping
sides.ability: After a ship executes a maneuver, if it is at range 0-1 of a friendly device, you may acquire a lock on that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

sides.title: Clan Training
sides.ability: Before you engage, if you are not focused and there is an enemy ship in your [Front Arc] at range 1, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a red [Focus] action. After you perform an attack, if the defender is destroyed, recover 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Notorious
sides.ability: After you defend, if the attacker is in your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, the attacker gains 1 strain token. While you perform an attack, if the defender is strained, you may reroll 1 blank result.

sides.title: Enduring
sides.ability: While you defend, if you are not in the attacker's [Bullseye Arc], [Critical Hit] results are neutralized before [Hit] results. After you suffer [Critical Hit] damage, you may perform a [Calculate] or [Focus] action on your action bar, even while stressed, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Attack Speed
sides.ability: After you fully execute a [3 [Straight]] or [4 [Straight]] maneuver, you may perform a boost using the [1 [Straight]] template. (This is not an action).

sides.title: Fanatic
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if you are damaged, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Vengeful
sides.ability: After a friendly ship at range 0-3 is destroyed, if that ship is limited, you may remove 1 of your red tokens or recover 1 recurring charge on your ship card.
While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 calculate token to increase or decrease the range requirement by 1, to a limit of 0-5.
sides.title: Bombardment Specialists

sides.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, you may spend up to 2 [Energy] to coordinate that many additional ships at range 0-1 of the ship you coordinated.
sides.title: Comms Team

sides.ability: Before you engage, you may spend 1 or more [Energy] to flip that many of your Offline upgrade cards. Action: Spend 1 or more [Energy] to repair that many of your faceup Ship damage cards.
sides.title: Damage Control Team

sides.ability: While you perform a primary or [Hardpoint] attack, you may spend 1 or more [Energy] to reroll that many attack dice.
sides.title: Gunnery Specialists

sides.ability: While you perform an attack, if you are calculating, you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.
sides.title: IG-RM Droids

sides.ability: While you perform a [Reload] action, you may spend up to 3 [Energy] to reload that many additional [Charge] on your equipped [Missile]/[Torpedo] upgrades. After you perform a [Reload] action, you may spend 1 [Energy] to remove 1 disarm token.
sides.title: Ordnance Team

sides.ability: You can maintain up to 3 locks on different objects. After you perform a [Lock] action, you may spend up to 2 [Energy] to acquire a lock on that many other objects at range 0-1 of the object you locked, ignoring range restrictions.
sides.title: Sensor Experts

sides.ability: During the End Phase, each other ship at range 0-1 cannot remove its tractor tokens. Before a tractored enemy ship at range 0-1 reveals its dial, you may spend 1 [Energy]. if you do, while that ship executes its maneuver this activation, it reduces the speed of that maneuver by 1, to a minimum of 1.
sides.title: Tractor Technicians
Corsair Crew
sides.text: While you perform an attack against a standard ship, you may spend 1 [Hit] result. If you do, the defender gains 1 deplete token.

sides.ability: While you perform a white [Focus] action, treat it as red instead. At the start of the End Phase, repair all of your faceup Crew damage cards.
sides.title: Droid Crew
Advanced Optics
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a [Hit] result.

sides.title: Ferrosphere Paint
sides.ability: After an enemy ship locks you, if you are not in that ship's [Bullseye Arc], that ship gains 1 stress token unless it chooses to break its lock.

sides.title: Hyperspace Tracking Data
sides.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, you may choose a number between 0 and 6. Treat your initiative as the chosen value during Setup. After Setup, assign 1 focus or evade token to each friendly ship at range 0-2.

sides.title: Primed Thrusters
sides.ability: While you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can perform [Barrel Roll] and [Boost] actions even while stressed.

sides.title: Targeting Synchronizer
sides.ability: While a friendly ship at range 1-2 performs an attack against a target you have locked, that ship ignores the [Lock] attack requirement.

sides.title: Pattern Analyzer
sides.ability: While you fully execute a red maneuver, before the Check Difficulty step, you may perform 1 action.

sides.title: Biohexacrypt Codes
sides.ability: While you coordinate or jam, if you have a lock on a ship, you may spend that lock to choose that ship, ignoring range restrictions.

During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] and gain 1 disarm token to recover 1 shield. Before you would gain 1 non-lock token, if you are not stressed, you may spend 1 [Charge] to gain 1 stress token instead.
sides.title: Deuterium Power Cells
Automated Target Priority
sides.ability: While you perform an attack, you must choose a defender at the closest valid attack range. After you perform an attack that missed, place 1 calculate token on this card. Before you engage, you may remove 1 calculate token from this card to gain a matching token.

sides.title: Sensor Buoy Suite
sides.ability: Setup: Before placing forces, place 2 sensor buoy remotes beyond range 2 of any edge. Before you engage, you may acquire a lock on a ship at range 0-1 of a friendly sensor buoy, ignoring range restrictions.

sides.title: Sensor Scramblers
sides.ability: Setup: Gain 1 cloak token. While you are cloaked, other ships cannot acquire locks on you. During the End Phase, if you are cloaked and there is an enemy ship at range 0-3, you must decloak. If you do and that decloak fails, lose 1 cloak token.

sides.title: Andrasta
sides.ability: Add [Device] slot.

sides.title: Black One
sides.ability: After you perform a [SLAM] action, lose 1 [Charge]. Then you may gain 1 ion token to remove 1 disarm token. If your [Charge] is inactive, you cannot perform the [SLAM] action.

sides.title: Dauntless
sides.ability: After you partially execute a maneuver, you may perform 1 white action, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Ghost
sides.ability: You can dock 1 attack shuttle or Sheathipede-class shuttle. Your docked ships can deploy only from your rear guides.

sides.title: Havoc
sides.ability: Remove [Crew] slot. Add [Sensor] and [Astromech] slots.

sides.title: Hound's Tooth
sides.ability: 1 Z-95-AF4 headhunter can dock with you.

sides.title: IG-2000
sides.ability: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 upgrade.

sides.title: Lando's Millennium Falcon
sides.ability: 1 Escape Craft may dock with you. While you have an Escape Craft docked, you may treat its shields as if they were on your ship card. While you perform a primary attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.

sides.title: Marauder
sides.ability: While you perform a primary [Rear Arc] attack, you may reroll 1 attack die. Add [Gunner] slot.

sides.title: Millennium Falcon
sides.ability: While you defend, if you are evading, you may reroll 1 defense die.

sides.title: Mist Hunter
sides.ability: Add [Cannon] slot.

sides.title: Moldy Crow
sides.ability: Gain a [Front Arc] primary weapon with a value of “3.” During the End Phase, do not remove up to 2 focus tokens.

sides.title: Outrider
sides.ability: While you perform an attack that is obstructed by an obstacle, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die. After you fully execute a maneuver, if you moved through or overlapped an obstacle, you may remove 1 of your red or orange tokens.

sides.title: Phantom
sides.ability: You can dock at range 0-1.

sides.title: Punishing One
sides.ability: While you perform a primary attack, if the defender is in your [Front Arc], roll 1 additional attack die. Remove [Crew] slot. Add [Astromech] slot.

sides.title: ST-321
sides.ability: After you perform a [Coordinate] action, you may choose an enemy ship at range 0-3 of the ship you coordinated. If you do, acquire a lock on that enemy ship, ignoring range restrictions.

sides.title: Shadow Caster
sides.ability: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is in your [Single Turret Arc] and your [Front Arc], the defender gains 1 tractor token.

sides.title: Slave I
sides.ability: After you reveal a turn ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]) or bank ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]) maneuver, you may set your dial to the maneuver of the same speed and bearing in the other direction. Add [Torpedo] slot.

sides.title: Virago
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a red [Boost] action. Add [Modification] slot.

sides.title: Rey's Millennium Falcon
sides.ability: If you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you can execute red Segnor's Loop [[Segnor's Loop Left] or [Segnor's Loop Right]] maneuvers and perform [Boost] and [Rotate Arc] actions even while stressed.

sides.title: Soulless One
sides.ability: While you defend, if the attacker is outside your firing arc, you may reroll 1 defense die.

sides.title: Scimitar
sides.ability: Setup: After the Place Forces step, you may cloak. After you decloak, you may choose an enemy ship in your [Bullseye Arc]. If you do, it gains 1 jam token.
Add [Gunner] slot. While you defend, if the attack range is 1, you may roll 1 additional defense die.
sides.title: Assailer

sides.ability: Add [Gunner] slot. While you perform an attack at attack range 1-2, you may add 1 [Focus] result.
sides.title: Blood Crow

sides.ability: You can reinforce only your [Full Front Arc]. While you defend, if you are reinforced and the attacker is in your [Full Front Arc], you may roll 1 additional defense die.
sides.title: Bright Hope

sides.ability: Add [Crew] and [Illicit] slots. If you are damaged, reduce the difficulty of your speed 3-5 maneuvers.
sides.title: Broken Horn

sides.ability: You can dock up to 2 small ships. After you perform a [Calculate] action, gain 1 calculate token.
sides.title: Corvus

sides.ability: Add [Team] and [Cargo] slots.
sides.title: Dodonna's Pride

sides.ability: Add [Crew] slot. After you perform an attack, if the defender was destroyed, you may perform a [Focus] or [Lock] action.
sides.title: Impetuous

sides.ability: Add [Cargo] slot. During the End Phase, you may recover 1 additional shield or 1 additional [Energy].
sides.title: Insatiable Worrt

sides.ability: Add [Team] slot. While you perform an attack, if the defender has an orange or red token, you may reroll up to 2 attack dice.
sides.title: Instigator

sides.ability: While a friendly ship at range 0-2 defends, if the attack is obstructed by an obstacle, you may spend 1 [Energy]. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.
sides.title: Jaina's Light

sides.ability: Setup: When you resolve Explosion with Wings, you may search the damage deck and choose a damage card with the Ship trait; you are dealt that card instead. Then, shuffle the damage deck. You can perform actions on damage cards even while ionized.
sides.title: Kaz's Fireball

sides.ability: You can dock up to 2 small ships. After a ship deploys from you, it may perform a [Focus] or [Barrel Roll] action.
sides.title: Liberator

sides.ability: Setup: You are placed in reserve. At the end of setup, you are placed in the play area at range 0-2 of a friendly ship.
sides.title: Luminous

sides.ability: Add [Turret], [Team], and [Cargo] slots. Bonus Attack: Perform a [Turret] attack.
sides.title: Merchant One

sides.ability: Add [Team] and [Cargo] slots. After you fully execute a white maneuver, recover 1 [Energy].
sides.title: Quantum Storm

sides.ability: After a ship deploys from you, it may acquire a lock on one ship you are locking, ignoring range restrictions.
sides.title: Requiem

sides.ability: Add [Sensor] slot. After you coordinate a friendly ship, you may spend 1 [Energy] to jam an enemy ship at range 0-2 of that ship, ignoring range restrictions.
sides.title: Suppressor

sides.ability: Add 2 [Crew] slots. While you defend, if the attacker is in your [Rear Arc], you may roll 1 additional defense die.
sides.title: Tantive IV

sides.ability: Add [Gunner] slot. While you perform a bonus attack, if you have not attacked the defender this round, you may reroll 1 attack die.
sides.title: Thunderstrike

sides.ability: Add [Crew] and [Cargo] slots. After a ship deploys from you, it may perform a [Evade] or [Boost] action.
sides.title: Vector

sides.ability: While you perform a [Front Arc] attack, if you are in the defender's [Full Rear Arc], you may change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result. Add [Gunner] slot.
sides.title: Slave I

sides.ability: Add [Gunner] slot.
sides.title: B6 Blade Wing Prototype

sides.ability: Before you engage, you may spend up to 2 calculate tokens. If you do, recover that many [Energy].
sides.title: Nautolan's Revenge

sides.ability: While you perform a Drill Beak attack at range 1, if the defender is tractored, treat it as being range 0 instead.
sides.title: Grappler

sides.ability: After you perform an attack, you may perform a red [Evade] action. While you defend, if you are evading, you may roll 1 additional defense die.
sides.title: Neimoidian Grasp

sides.ability: After you overlap a ship or a ship overlaps you, if it is not tractored, you may spend 1 [Energy]. If you do, it gains 3 tractor tokens.
sides.title: Trident

sides.ability: After you reveal a non-blue maneuver, if you are stressed, you may spend 2 [Charge] to gain 1 focus or evade token. Add [Crew] slot.
sides.title: Nightbrother

sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to repair 1 faceup ship damage card. Add [Crew] slot.
sides.title: Gauntlet

sides.ability: Setup: Place 1 non-limited [Illicit] upgrade facedown under this card. During the System Phase, you may reveal that [Illicit] upgrade and equip it as if it were equipped at Setup (without paying its points cost).
sides.title: Razor Crest

sides.ability: Add [Crew] and [Device] slots.

sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. After you declare the defender, the defender may choose to suffer 1 [Critical Hit] damage. If it does, skip the Attack and Defense Dice steps and the attack is treated as hitting.

sides.title: Adv. Proton Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. Change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Ion Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.

sides.title: Proton Torpedoes
sides.ability: Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. Change 1 [Hit] result to a [Critical Hit] result.
Attack ([Lock]): Spend 1 [Charge]. During the Neutralize Results step, [Critical Hit] results are canceled before [Hit] results. After this attack hits, the defender loses 1 shield.
sides.title: Plasma Torpedoes
Tracking Torpedoes
sides.ability: During the System Phase, you may spend up to 3 [Charge] to launch that many tracking torpedoes using the [3 [Bank Left]], [4 [Straight]], and [3 [Bank Right]] templates. Each device must use a seperate template. Then each device may acquire a lock on an object you have locked, ignoring range restrictions. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.

sides.ability: Attack

sides.ability: Attack: If this attack hits, spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to cause the defender to suffer 1 [Hit] damage. All remaining [Hit]/[Critical Hit] results inflict ion tokens instead of damage.
